Logout My profile My journal My tips My beats My beats Collect beat Journals Peripheral Play Povi Story Upload Povi Story HRDemoActivity Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer Example action Tutorial drawer open drawer close Preferences Select Child MEET POVI RECEIVE TIPS START TALKING POVI helps you log into\nyour child\'s universe Receive a daily thought\nprovoking question sent\ncustomized to your schedule Start stimulating conversations\nwith your children and record\ntheir responses By signing up, you agree to Povi Family Connect\'s Terms and Conditions of Use and Privacy Policy Oops! No Journal Entries \nto display. Record an entry \nin Tip of the Day. Forgot your password? Hi,
I am getting bored of asking my kid, \"How\'s your day?\" or \"How\'s school?\" everyday, and getting a \"Fine\" or \"OK\" from their replies.

Povi Family Connect app sends me inspirations daily thoughts like \"Did you help anyone today?\" \"Why is it nice to give people compliments?\"

I get really funny answers from my kids that I have recorded in their daily Povi Journal too.
Perhaps you want to give Povi Family Connect app a try too?

Thank you.
